name: 2018 Rewind: Another Year of Flight!
description:
2018 has been a massive year for inflight Video! With your help we've managed to take inflight Video to another level, amassing over 500,000 followers across our social platforms.  

This video is a look back at every flight I've taken this year and a thank you to every single one of you - we wouldn't be here without you!

Every flight you see here can be seen in full length at inflightvideo.tv, or via supporting us on Patreon.

Thanks again for your support and here's to 2019!


EXCLUSIVE FULL FLIGHT VIDEOS AND MUCH MORE: BECOME A VIP TODAY AT http://patreon.com/inflightvideo

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE!

FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/inflightvideo
MERCH & MORE: http://inflightvideo.tv
